RelativeTemporalAnnotation.TEXT: Admission Date : 2019-06-25 Discharge Date : 2019-07-01 Service : CARDIOTHORACIC History of Present Illness : 69yoM with OA having workup for knee replacements found to be in Afib , had stress test that was positive followed by cardiac catheterization which revealed severe 3VD . Then referred for CABG Brief Hospital Course : 69 yo M with known Atrial fibrillation and coronary artery disease admitted preop for transition fro Coumadin to Heparin . Brought to the OR on 06-26 for CABG , please see OR report for details . In summary pt had off pump CABGx4 with LIMA-LAD , SVG OM-Y graft - Diag , SVG-PDA . Pt tolerated surgery well and was transferred to CT CMED ICU . He did well in immediate post-op period was extubated and on POD1 he was transferred to the step down floor . On POD2 his chest tubes and epicardial pacing wires were removed and his Coumadin was restarted . Over the next several days his activity was advanced on POD5 it was decided he was stable and ready to be discharged home with visiting nurses .
